REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND DRUG ABUSE

Title: Relates to setting standards for addiction professionals
Summary: Relates to the scope of responsibilities of the office of addiction services and supports; defines addiction professional.
LawCode: Amd ยง19.07, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to setting standards for addiction professionals
